title: Configuration Error Log
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
The 
Configuration Error Log
 is accessed from the 
System
 section of the 
Global Settings
 page.
The 
Configuration Error Log
 maintains a log of server-side errors. This log can be used to aid troubleshooting when making configuration changes. This page is available to 
System Administrators
.
The log will be reset periodically so may only display errors from the last 14 days.
The 
Configuration Error Log
 tracks errors in the following procedures:
 
Level One Formulas
 
Level Two Formulas
 
Role Formulas
 
Submit Logic
 
Transaction Formulas
 
Category Formulas
 
Advanced Logic
 Custom Field 
Visibility Condition
 logic

https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Configuration_Error_Log&oldid=30127
